abstract: BNP Paribas, the largest French bank, said Tuesday that it would raise $6.27 billion from investors to repay government bailout funds.
snippet: BNP Paribas, the largest French bank, said Tuesday that it would raise $6.27 billion from investors to repay government bailout funds.
lead_paragraph: BNP Paribas, the largest French bank, said on Tuesday that it would raise €4.3 billion from investors to repay government bailout funds, The New York Times’s David Jolly and Chris V. Nicholson reported.

headline.main: BNP Paribas to Raise $6.27 Billion to Repay Bailout
